name: @eradani-inc/ecc-template
description: Eradani Connect Client web service template

scripts.setup: npm run reset-git && npm run install-deps && npm install && npm build-connectors && npm run generate-config && npm run package:release
scripts.build-connectors: cd node_modules/@eradani-inc/ec-client && make -C native library && make -C native
scripts.package:dev: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build:dev && npm run copy:dev && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.package:fresh: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build:dev && npm run copy:dev && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.package:release: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run build:release && npm run build-qsys && npm run copy:release && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.start:debug: node --inspect dist/src/app.js && printf "[1;36mOpen an SSH Tunnel on your local machine with [1;32mssh -L 9229:localhost:9229 user@your.server.address[0m"&& printf "[1;36mThen the Chrome interactive debugger [1;32mopen chrome://inspect in Google Chrome and click Open Dedicated Development Tools for Node[0m"
scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs src && printf "[1;36mView Generated Documentation with [1;32mnpm run view-docs[0m"
scripts.install-npm: cd dist && rm -rf node_modules && shx ln -s ../node_modules node_modules && cd ..
scripts.install-deps: ((ls /QOpenSys && yum group install "Development Tools" -y && yum install git make-gnu unzip nodejs12 unixODBC unixODBC-devel -y) || echo "Installing without Yum") && npm install -g pm2 && (ln -s /QOpenSys/pkgs/lib/nodejs12/bin/pm2 /QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/pm2 || echo "PM2 already set up")
scripts.reset-git: ((rm -rf .git && git init && git add . && git commit -am "chore(Setup): Clone Eradani TypeScript Template App v2.1.0") || echo "No remote git repo connected") && printf "[1;32m===== Disconnected from template GitHub Repo. You should connect to your own with [git remote add origin <url>] =====[0m"
scripts.copy:dev: (shx mkdir dist/logs || shx echo Logs directory already exists) && shx cp -r tests qsys LICENSE README.md package.json dist
scripts.copy:release: shx mkdir dist/logs && shx cp -r tests qsys LICENSE README.md package.json dist

author: Eradani
